Pages.Title: How will your organisation train its apprentices?
Pages.LinkTitle: How will your organisation train its apprentices?

Details.Title: What is a connected company or charity?
Details.Details:
A connected company is part of the same group and has the same ultimate parent company as your organisation.

A connected charity is part of the same group of charities and has a majority of the same controlling trustees as your organisation.

Questions.Label: How will your organisation train its apprentices?

Options.Label: In your organisation and connected companies or charities
Options.Value: In your organisation and connected companies or charities

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will train its apprentices

Pages.Title: How would you describe your organisation?
Pages.LinkTitle: How would you describe your organisation?

Questions.Label: How would you describe your organisation?

Options.Label: A public service mutual
Options.HintText: An organisation that's left the public sector but still delivers public services.

Options.Label: A sheltered workshop
Options.HintText: An organisation that provides employment opportunities for people who are developmentally, physically, or mentally impaired.

Options.Label: A small or medium enterprise (SME)
Options.HintText: As explained by the European Commission (opens in a new window or tab).

Options.Label: A third sector organisation
Options.HintText: An organisation that does voluntary or community work. For example, a charity.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how you would describe your organisation
